Get address derivation information including public keys and puzzle hashes.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>

  parameters={undefined}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the get_derivations endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Get address derivation information","required":["offset","limit"],"properties":{"hardened":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to retrieve hardened derivations","default":false,"example":true},"limit":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Number of derivations to return","example":50,"minimum":0},"offset":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Starting offset for pagination","example":0,"minimum":0}},"title":"GetDerivations"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from get_derivations","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with derivation records","required":["derivations","total"],"properties":{"derivations":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["index","public_key","address"],"properties":{"address":{"type":"string"},"index":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","minimum":0},"public_key":{"type":"string"}},"title":"DerivationRecord"},"description":"List of address derivations"},"total":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Total number of derivations available","minimum":0}},"title":"GetDerivationsResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
